name: Shilo Village
Start point: Mosol, deep in Karamja Jungle, east of a walled village.
Description: Rashiliyia, Queen of the Undead, has returned and brought a plague of Undead upon Shilo Village. Help Mosol find a way to solve the problem and gain access to the village.

Requirements.Other: Must be able to defeat level 60 Undead, and consecutively defeat level 86, 65, and 88 monsters.

substeps: Find Mosol wandering east of the walled Shilo Village in the Karamja jungle.
Talk to Mosol. Ask what you can do.
He will give you a Wambum belt and ask you to find Trufitus.
Find Trufitus in his hut north of the walled village (where Jungle Potion started).
Talk to Trufitus, tell him Rashiliyia has returned.
Give him the Wambum belt.
Ask ALL available questions about the legend and the Temple of Ah-za Rhoon.
Tell him you will search the temple.

Walkthrough.step: Entering the Temple of Ah-za Rhoon
substeps: Go east from Trufitus's hut until you see a river, then head south to find a log bridge.
Cross the log bridge (Agility check) and continue south to find a Mound of Earth.
Search the Mound of Earth.
Use your Spade on the Mound of Earth.
Use your Lit candle on the hole.
Use your Rope on the hole.
Search the hole again to climb down into the temple. (Beware of level 60 Undead ones inside).
Walk south slightly and find a cave-in. Search it and wriggle through.
Walk north to the northwest corner. Search the loose rocks to find a Tattered Scroll.
Walk southeast to a small room. Search the old sacks to find a Crumpled Scroll.
Walk north to find Ancient gallows. Search them to find Zadimus' Corpse.
Return to the first cave area (where you entered).
Attempt to craft the table into a raft (you will find there isn't enough wood).
Walk southeast to find a waterfall. Search it and climb up (Agility check, retry if you fall).
Return to Trufitus.
Use the Tattered Scroll, Crumpled Scroll, and Zadimus' Corpse on him.
He will instruct you to bury the corpse. Read both scrolls.
Go to the Tribal Statue near Trufitus's hut.
Use the Spade on the ground in front of the statue to bury Zadimus' Corpse.
Zadimus will appear. Talk to him to receive a Bone shard.
Return to Trufitus and give him the Bone shard. He will tell you about another tomb.
Go southwest from Trufitus's hut.
Find some rocks near the river and climb them (Agility check).
Cross the bridge (Agility check, retry if you fail).
Head slightly north and search the pile of rocks to enter the tomb.
Head south inside the tomb and search the dolmen.
You will receive a Sword pommel, a Locating crystal, and Bervirius notes.
Go to the east room and climb the rocks to exit the tomb.
Return to Trufitus and give him the Sword pommel, Locating crystal, and Bervirius notes.
He will tell you to make a special necklace.
Go slightly northwest of Trufitus's hut to find an anvil (or use any anvil).
Make sure you have a Bronze bar, Hammer, and Chisel (buy from the General Store south of the anvil if needed).
Use the Bronze bar on the anvil to make Bronze wire.
Use the Chisel on the Sword pommel to get Bone beads.
Use the Bone beads on the Bronze wire to create Beads of the dead.
Show the Beads of the dead to Trufitus.
Gather your combat equipment (armour, weapon), food, and optionally prayer potions.
Go east from Trufitus's hut and cross the log bridge again.
Head north slightly and find a specific Palm tree (it will have a search option).
Search the Palm tree to reveal a hidden door.
Use the Chisel on the Bone shard (from Zadimus) to make a Bone key.
Equip the Beads of the dead amulet.
Use the Bone key on the hidden door to enter.
Go south and open the gate.
Climb the rocks.
Go west to find another door.
Use 3 Bones (dropped by undead or brought with you) on the door to open it.
Ensure you are wearing the Beads of the dead amulet and are prepared for combat.
Search the dolmen inside the room.
Defeat the Zombie (level 86).
Defeat the Skeleton (level 65) that appears next.
Defeat the Ghost (level 88) that appears last.
Do NOT leave the room during the fight, or you'll have to restart the sequence.
After defeating all three, search the dolmen again to take Rashiliyia's Corpse.
Go back towards the entrance of this tomb.
Use the Bone key on the Tomb Exit door to leave.
Return to the *second* tomb (the one where you found the Sword pommel, southwest of Trufitus, requiring climbing rocks and crossing a bridge). Enter it again by searching the rock pile.
Go south to the dolmen inside.
Use Rashiliyia's Corpse on the dolmen.
A cutscene will play, and the quest will be complete! You can now enter Shilo Village.
